statements: SELECT id, strategy_name, creative_name, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives;
SELECT strategy_name, creative_name, conversion_rate, id FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives;
SELECT creative_name, conversion_rate, strategy_name, id FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives;
SELECT conversion_rate, creative_name, id, strategy_name FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives;
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY strategy_name DESC, creative_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, creative_name, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%A%' OR strategy_name LIKE '%B%' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, creative_name, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives WHERE conversion_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.7 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives WHERE strategy_name IN ('Strategy A', 'Strategy B') AND (conversion_rate < 0.3 OR conversion_rate > 0.8);
SELECT strategy_name, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_marketing_creatives GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING AVG(conversion_rate) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM creatives;
SELECT creative_name, format FROM creatives WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ms.strategy_name, c.creative_name FROM marketing_strategies ms JOIN creatives c ON ms.id = c.strategy_id;
SELECT id, strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%digital%';
SELECT c.creative_name, c.format, ms.strategy_name FROM creatives c JOIN marketing_strategies ms ON c.strategy_id = ms.id ORDER BY ms.start_date DESC, c.format ASC;
SELECT * FROM ab_tests;
SELECT test_id, test_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_tests;
SELECT test_name, conversion_rate FROM ab_tests WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, creative_type FROM creatives WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND creation_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT test_id, test_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM ab_tests;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT creative_name, creative_type, creation_date FROM creatives ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT test_name, start_date, end_date FROM ab_tests WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE length(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM Strategy_A;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date FROM Strategy_A WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT creative_name, creation_date FROM Creative_A ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, group_id FROM Test_Participants WHERE participant_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT test_id, conversion_rate, test_date FROM Test_Results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Strategy_A;
SELECT creative_name, creation_date FROM Creative_A WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_id, conversion_rate FROM Test_Results ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, end_date FROM Strategy_A WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, group_id FROM Test_Participants WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM A ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT strategy_name, creative_name FROM B WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT id, creative_name, conversion_rate FROM C WHERE strategy_name = 'XYZ'
SELECT * FROM D ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, strategy_name, creative_name FROM E WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, strategy_name, creative_name, conversion_rate FROM A WHERE id = 1
SELECT strategy_name, creative_name FROM B ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) FROM C WHERE strategy_name = 'Marketing'
SELECT id, strategy_name, creative_name, conversion_rate FROM D WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM E WHERE strategy_name IN ('Paid Search', 'Social Media')
